name: react-delta-table
description: A react data table component including pagination, search, export to json and csv and more...

scripts.build: rm -rf dist/ && node-sass src/assets/style/ -o dist/cjs/assets/style && node-sass src/assets/style/ -o dist/esm/assets/style && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs

author: Arthur Béquié
